Params: {3: 'At the forward operating base, everyone is preparing for the upcoming mission.'}
{2: 'Sophia', 3: 'I have something... I wanted to ask you.', 4: '1'}
{2: "Didn't you want to ask me something?", 3: '14'}
{2: 'Sophia', 3: 'During our last mission, you called the entire squad to help me when I got surrounded.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Sophia', 3: 'If you keep implementing this tactic, that poses a lot of risk over time.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Sophia', 3: "Especially for you and the other members... This may put the team in a dangerous situation that they shouldn't be in otherwise.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Sophia', 3: "It doesn't follow in line with maximizing interests, nor does it guarantee that the mission will be a success.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'Commandant, I came to... Oh! Hello, Sophia.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'We were just... discussing your situation. I wanted to have a chat with the commandant.', 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: "Since you're here, we can discuss it together.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'We need to make some things clear.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'Sophia, stay in formation as much as possible from now on.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "Or else Liv and I can't provide support, and our connection with the commandant will weaken.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Sophia', 3: "If you can't keep up, then just leave me behind.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Sophia', 3: "I'm used to going at it alone in Asslam. Don't worry about me.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: 'How is that okay?! If you get surrounded again...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Sophia', 3: "And If I can't... No one should get hurt because of me.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: "Sophia, I don't know what your mindset was whenever you went into battle...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'But for us Gray Ravens, we don\'t have the concept of being "expendable" or "sacrificial."', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'We hope the same goes for you, too.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Sophia', 3: 'I don\'t understand. Jamilah said, "Rational sacrifice is also a means to victory."', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Sophia', 3: "...My mistake. I shouldn't make decisions on behalf of the commandant.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Sophia turns and leaves with a blank expression on her face.'}
{2: 'Give her some time to think it over.', 3: '77'}
{2: "As for the question I don't know the answer to...", 3: '79'}
{2: "...I'll find out the answer by myself."}
